Package org.lwjgl.system.jemalloc

Class JEmallocAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.jemalloc.JEmallocAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryUtil.MemoryAllocator
    public class JEmallocAllocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryUtil.MemoryAllocator
    A MemoryUtil.MemoryAllocator implementation using the jemalloc library.
